original_text:
And he has raised up for his people a horn,
    the praise of all his faithful servants,
    of Israel, the people close to his heart.
Praise the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 그의 백성의 뿔을 높이셨으니 그는 모든 성도 곧 그를 가까이 하는 백성 이스라엘 자손의 찬양 받을 이시로다 할렐루야

sentences.original_text: And he has raised up for his people a horn
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 백성을 위해 뿔을 세우셨다

sentences.original_text: the praise of all his faithful servants
of Israel, the people close to his heart
